rules_text:
Flying
[i]Aspiring Leader[/i] – Whenever Tanith, Aspiring Leader attacks, creature tokens you control get +1+0.
[i]Promote[/i] – Whenever you create a creature token, if you control three or more creature tokens, transform Tanith.
[i]Holy Guard[/i] – {2}{W}{B}: Create a 2/2 white Pegasus Knight creature token with flying.
